wikipedia_page.main: Mahendra Singh Mehta (born 9 December 1955) is an Indian businessman. He is the chief executive of Vedanta Resources plc, a British multinational diversified metals and mining company.

response: *Mahendra Mehta (born 1955), CEO, Vedanta Resources; also known as Mahendar Singh
*Mahendra Mehta, CEO, Reliance Infrastructure and former group CEO, Vedanta Resources
